title: Connie Nielsen Reads ‘Rallying to Keep the Game Alive’
text:
Listen and subscribe to our podcast from your mobile device: Via Apple Podcasts | Via RadioPublic | Via Stitcher

This week, the Modern Love podcast revisits “Rallying to Keep the Game Alive.” The 2013 essay was written by Ann Leary, the author of three novels and the memoir “An Innocent, a Broad.”

Ms. Leary’s essay is the basis of one of the episodes in Amazon Prime Video’s new TV series “Modern Love,” which premieres Oct. 18.

It is read by the actress Connie Nielsen, who appeared in the 2017 film “Wonder Woman” and has a recurring role in the TV mini-series “I Am the Night.”
description: The Modern Love podcast revisits an essay that inspired an episode in the upcoming Modern Love TV series.
